subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hakeem Olajuwon and the Knicks Coach Mike Woodson formed a bond when they played together for the Rockets. The two will work together to strengthen the offense of the Knicks.
snippet: Hakeem Olajuwon and the Knicks Coach Mike Woodson formed a bond when they played together for the Rockets. The two will work together to strengthen the offense of the Knicks.
